tool_description: Validates volunteer opportunity content against platform-specific requirements, guidelines, and content policies.

listing_content.description: JSON string containing the volunteer listing content to validate

target_platforms.description: Array of platform names to check requirements against

auto_fix_issues.description: Whether to automatically fix minor compliance issues

error_messages: Invalid listing content: The listing_content is not valid JSON or is missing required fields.
Unsupported platform: One or more target_platforms are not supported for requirements checking.
Invalid validation strictness: Use 'lenient', 'standard', or 'strict' for validation_strictness.
Content policy violation: The listing content violates one or more platform content policies.
Requirements check failed: Unable to complete requirements validation due to service issues.
usage: Provide listing_content as JSON string and specify target_platforms. Adjust validation_strictness and enable auto_fix_issues as needed.

overall_compliance.description: Whether content meets all platform requirements

violations_found.description: List of requirement violations or issues found

auto_fixes_applied.description: List of automatic fixes applied if enabled
